Sentencas: Phase-transfer-separation (PTS) is a novel method for processing ultra-fine ceramic powders.
Titulo: Preparation of nanosized yttria stabilized zirconia powders by phase-transfer-separation process

Sentencas: In PTS, the highly hydrophilic hydroxide precipitate can be effectively and quickly extracted from aqueous solution.
Titulo: Preparation of nanosized yttria stabilized zirconia powders by phase-transfer-separation process

Sentencas: PTS was firstly applied in the current work to prepare nanosized 8mol% yttria stabilized zirconia (8YSZ) powders.
Titulo: Preparation of nanosized yttria stabilized zirconia powders by phase-transfer-separation process

Sentencas: The as-prepared, cubic-phase, 8YSZ powders have an average particle size of 20 similar to 30 nanometers.
Titulo: Preparation of nanosized yttria stabilized zirconia powders by phase-transfer-separation process

Sentencas: The contents of Na and Cl are 7.05 x 10(-6) and 1.414 x 10(-4), respectively.
Titulo: Preparation of nanosized yttria stabilized zirconia powders by phase-transfer-separation process

Sentencas: Petroleum ether, as one of the main starting materials, can be recovered, with a recovery efficiency of about 80%.
Titulo: Preparation of nanosized yttria stabilized zirconia powders by phase-transfer-separation process

Sentencas: From the results obtained, it can be concluded that phase-transfer-separation is a promising process for the preparation of ultra-fine ceramic powders.
Titulo: Preparation of nanosized yttria stabilized zirconia powders by phase-transfer-separation process
